pr_title: Kogito 2532 - monitoring addon support multiple dmn built in types

timeline.message: add LocalDateTime handler, generate metrics for LocalDateTime, generate panels for date and time dmn type

timeline.bodyText:
What is the reason of this change? How this string is used?
Side note, are you sure type cannot be null?
timeline.author: danielezonca
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -95,10 +95,11 @@ public static String generateDomainSpecificDMNDashboard(String templatePath, Str
                     jgrafana.addPanel(PanelType.GRAPH,
                                       "Decision " + decision.getName(),
                                       String.format("%s_dmn_result{endpoint = \"%s\", decision = \"%s\"}",
-                                                    type,
+                                                    type.toString().replace(" ", "_"),

replies.bodyText: @danielezonca dmn type might contain spaces (for example the type "time and date"), and in the PrompQL query of grafana spaces are not allowed. So by default we have to replace the spaces with something else
replies.author: r00ta

replies.bodyText: For your other question, the check on null is already done few lines above this one
replies.author: r00ta

timeline.message: add Duration type support, refactoring quantiles tests with abstract class, add tests
optimize imports and code, remove duplicated code with constants
add support for years and months duration + add tests
add date and time handlers and tests
Refactoring type handling with abstract class
refactoring localTime and localDate grafana functions, add licence headers

timeline.bodyText: Please use lower letter at the beginning of the method.
